bio: Vigram is a citizen of Winterhold with a deep distrust of mages and strong love for his horse, Francis. Over the years, he has developed a number of harebrained schemes regarding the elimination of the College and the enlistment of slave labor to rebuild the city, although he attributes most of them to Francis. Vigram believes he is sane when infact, he is quite mad. Francis is female.
name: Vigram
